Since the 2021-22 school year, average class sizes in Districts 3 and 5 have remained below the proposed class size caps.

In kindergarten through third grade and fourth through eighth grade, class sizes have remained below the proposed class size caps since the 2020-21 school year.

Kindergarten through third grade

Fourth through eighth grade

Proposed class size cap: 20 students

School year

Note: Average class sizes for kindergarten through eighth grade were calculated using average class sizes of each grade at each school. Average class sizes for high school were calculated using average class sizes of each core class at each school. Only general education programs were included in calculations. Preliminary data was used for 2017-18 only.

Source: New York City Department of Education

Graphic by Laya Gollamudi
